full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 139 of 261 1300
LC6VMAX4 Kate - cross
1
A. Yes.
Q. And experiences that you have discussed with other individuals who claim to have been abused by Epstein; correct?
A. I have not discussed these experiences with others.
Q. Experiences that you have discussed with your lawyer who represents other --
MS. POMERANTZ: Objection.
Q. -- victims?
THE COURT: Sustained.
Q. You were at a meeting with the government where your immigration status was discussed, do you recall?
A. Yes.
Q. And during that meeting, a form that was shown to you today, a U visa form, was handed to the government. Do you remember that?
A. I do not recall.
Q. Do you remember that your lawyer, Mr. Edwards, was at that meeting?
A. I would imagine he would have been.
Q. And do you recall that Mr. Edwards is the one who gave that form to the government?
A. I do not recall.
Q. And do you recall that Mr. Edwards had consulted with you during that meeting concerning your U visa?
MS. POMERANTZ: Objection, your Honor.
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00018476
